HEADLINE: With reference to the earlier letter dated November 21, 2016, Piramal Enterprises Ltd has submitted to BSE the transcript of the Conference Call dated November 22, 2016.
NEWSSUB: Transcript of Conference Call with Investors/Analysts

HEADLINE: Piramal Enterprises Ltd has informed BSE regarding "Transcript of Conference Call with Investors/Analysts".
NEWSSUB: Transcript of Conference Call with Investors/Analysts

HEADLINE:
Further to our letter dated 21st October, 2019 whereby we had given the advance intimation of Conference Call with Investors/Analysts, enclosed please find the transcript of the Earnings Conference Call held on 22nd October, 2019 to discuss the Q2 & H1 FY2020 Results of the Company.

Pursuant to Regulation 46 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, the transcript of the conference call is also hosted on the website of the Company. ....
